content:
Meeting friends at a pub before a show is a great way to get in the right mood. There are several excellent pubs near the O2 Academy Islington that serve food and have a good selection of beers. Here are a few recommendations:

1. **The Angel Tavern** (5-minute walk from O2 Academy Islington)
	* A classic pub with a cozy atmosphere, serving a range of cask ales, craft beers, and delicious pub grub. Try their famous burgers or sandwiches.
2. **The York** (7-minute walk from O2 Academy Islington)
	* A beautifully restored Victorian pub with a warm atmosphere. They offer a wide selection of beers, wines, and cocktails, along with a menu featuring seasonal British dishes.
3. **The Old Queens Head** (10-minute walk from O2 Academy Islington)
	* A historic pub with a lively atmosphere, serving a range of cask ales, craft beers, and a menu featuring traditional pub classics like fish and chips, burgers, and sandwiches.
4. **The Islington** (12-minute walk from O2 Academy Islington)
	* A modern pub with a spacious interior, offering a wide selection of beers, wines, and cocktails. They serve a menu of international dishes, including vegan and gluten-free options.
5. **The Hop & Berry** (15-minute walk from O2 Academy Islington)
	* A craft beer pub with an impressive selection of brews from around the world. They also serve a menu of tasty pub snacks, including burgers, sandwiches, and sharing plates.

All of these pubs are within walking distance of the O2 Academy Islington, so you can't go wrong with any of them. If you're looking for a specific type of beer or cuisine, I recommend checking their websites or social media to get an idea of what they offer.

Remember to plan ahead and arrive at the pub with enough time to grab a drink and some food before the show. You can always check the pub's website or call ahead to book a table, especially if you're planning to meet a larger group.

Have a great time meeting your friends and enjoying the show!
